verbs.description: [ARG0: red sox] [V: take] [ARG1: the loss] [ARGM-LOC: in game 1] [ARGM-LOC: at fenway 2 - 1 lefthander] felix doubront was scheduled to start wednesday game against the rays at fenway park before rain washed the contest out but manager john farrell flip - flopped right - hander jake peavy and doubront in today doubleheader with the idea being that peavy would likely go deeper into the game than doubront cesar ramos baseball mike napoli boston red sox jake peavy
